mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) COMMENT_COUNT FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = 2 AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_WRITE_DATE, BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO, READ_COUNT, LIKE_COUNT FROM "BOARD" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT MEMBER_NICKNAME, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_WRITE_DATE, MEMBER_NO, PARENT_COMMENT_NO FROM "COMMENT" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "BOARD" VALUES(SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{memberNo}, 2)
